Medical.Perscription: Dysopyramide x3 daily for Heartrate regulation
Medical.Notes:
Patient suffers from atrial fibrillation. Was recommended to be fitted with a pacemaker to ensure patient does not suffer sudden heart attacks.
References: . . Pacemaker connection ID: 202.4.121.229 Pacemaker maintenance: 203.19.252.152 . . Extra Details: Successful test subject of the Kellis Biotech Pacemaker 2.11 firmware patch.
